changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView: select a.id,m.id as equipment_type_id,m.equipment_type,e.equipment_code ||'.'||a.area_code as position, a.freeze_frame_number, temp.count_of_used,temp.project_id,temp.project_name,temp.project_code, (select count(s.id) from support_rack s where s.area_id = a.id and s.status!='0000') as count_of_shelves, ((select count(s.id) from support_rack s where s.area_id = a.id and s.status!='0000')- temp.count_of_used)as count_of_rest, a.status, a.equipment_id,e.equipment_code,a.area_code from area a left join equipment e on a.equipment_id = e.id left join equipment_modle m on e.equipment_modle_id = m.id left join ( select box.project_id,box.project_name,box.project_code,box.area_id,count(1) as count_of_used from frozen_box box where box.status in ('2004','2006') group by box.project_id,box.project_name,box.project_code,box.area_id )temp on temp.area_id = a.id where a.status !='0000'
